name: Fastbook
description:
How to play:
Identify the validity of the post using the rules shown. 
Report the post or like it depending on the validity.
If you got it wrong, the Fraudmeter will increase!
Try to get the high score before the Fraudmeter fills up!

(warning: high score does not persist between reloads as of current.)

Made in collaboration with @irfnrsydi#5702, @Lionel#4414 and @RiceUnSourDisWine#4013 for a 48-hours game jam.
